sentence.text: Over 140 disease-causing mutations have been described so far in cGMP biosynthetic process, 88% of which cause autosomal recessive Leber congenital amaurosis (clathrin coat assembly) while heterozygous missense mutations cause autosomal dominant cone-rod degeneration (adpositive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II).

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
